message: Another good reason for his retirement this year.

What an amazing story! 22 people die every day waiting for a transplant. More than 120,000 people are waiting for a transplant in the U.S. A person is added to the waitlist every 10 minutes. One donor can save 8 lives, and improve 50+. DonaeLifeWisconsin.org

Ending the seal hunt will destroy a part of Newfoundland's culture. These seals are killed in a quick and painless way. Idk about you guys but have you seen the videos on how they slaughter cows and chickens? Only adult seals are hunted and never the younger babies. These seals are overpopulated and are destroying our ecosystem as it is. Getting rid of the seal hunt would only create more problems. Paul McCartney said that he seen the slaughter first hand out on the ice, but all newfoundlanders know for a fact he never did go out there, he was actually at a studio in p.e.i.

Socialism is the killer. Anytime you start paying people out of tax money collected from the public you end up with roo few dollars to spend on gvt.housing, medical Drs and supplies and food programs. This is all because the gvmt can't support the economy with tax.dollars that are dwindling due to low paying jobs. This is the program that Bernie Sanders wants.for the USA. THE CAPITALISTIC SOCIETY that we live in is supplying all these basic needs to most of the world. And guess what, we are hated by most os those countries even though they would not exist without us.
